message.body: So I have an idea. For Christmas maybe we can get a clutter organizer to go to mom's house a couple weeks ahead of time and help her get organized and clean up and that could be her Christmas present. That way she won't feel so embarrassed when we come up. I can get quotes. They'll probably need to buy storage organizers and stuff. Cant imagine it would be more than $400 or so. Whatcha think.
If we try to do it with her, she'll get upset and not want to do it. She honestly needs to throw so many clothes away
I'm going up in a couple weeks maybe I can assess the situation
Yeah that sounds good! Maybe we could do one part of the house, like the garage or the basement or something.
Ok i'll put a game plan together
I've been asked to judge the film festival at Comic Con. Lol!
Whoaaaaaaaa awesomeeeee
So many nerds!
Yeah wheres it gonna be
It tours all over but I'm gonna be in a panel at the philly one end of June
Whoopi is gonna be there
Hahaha
Moms neighbor!
Really!?
Yeah.
Ask mom. She drives a yellow hummer. Well used to idk now
Ahahahaja! I had no idea!!
I have to run to a meeting downtown. L8r!
See ya
Did you know our cousin lauren has vitiligo?
